hackathon-description-text: IDT is hosting its first Blockchain hackathon!! Over the span of 3 days you will work the chain to build solutions for international money transfer, calling, and/or retail transactions. Join us at the IDT HQ for our kickoff and appetizers on Thursday April 29th. The kickoff will be recorded and streamed live. The building is closed on Friday/Saturday morning for Shabbat. In order to allow our participants more time to work on their projects, hacking will begin remotely on Friday. Doors will open at 7:00pm on Saturday at IDT. The first 100 participants to arrive will recieve official IDT T-shirts. In order to be eligible for judging, participants must check-in by 10:30am on Sunday.
hackathon-rules:
Groups of up to 5. 
Must be checked-in at the IDT building before 10:30am on Sunday April 22nd to be eligable for project submission.

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Ledger Nano S Wallet pre-loaded with cryptocurrency
Raspberry Pi 3 Retro Arcade Gaming Kit with 2 Classic USB Gamepads

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=520 Broad St, Newark, NJ 07102, USA
hackathon-description-header: Develop Blockchain solutions for international money transfer, calling, and retail transactions
